trans-unit.source: Draws an image within a region defined by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 定義的區域內繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: **Performance Note:** A <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> provides less features then an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> for rendering images, however, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> provides performance benefits making them ideal for describing backgrounds, clip art, and for low-level drawing with <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> objects.
trans-unit.target: **效能提示：** A<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>提供較少的功能則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>轉譯影像，不過，<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>提供效能優勢，使其適合用來描述背景、 美工圖案，並針對低層級的繪圖與<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>物件。

trans-unit.source: See [Drawing Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[繪圖物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>是一種<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，並因此可凍結來改善效能。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Source of the image that is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製影像的來源。

trans-unit.source: Defines the rectangular area in which the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 定義要在其中繪製影像的矩形區域。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> class that has the specified target <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體具有指定的目標 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source of the image
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像的來源。

trans-unit.source: The source of the image.
trans-unit.target: 影像的來源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是**null**。

trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>型別。

trans-unit.target: *imageUri*

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the image file.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]映像檔。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the region in which the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在其中繪製影像的區域。

trans-unit.source: The region in which the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 在其中繪製影像的區域。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>Empty</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>空</c>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier Field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata Flags
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料旗標

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect" /> 相依性屬性。
